title: Soloerotica 9
overview: Michael Ninn presents beautiful women, in stunning visualizations and individual experiences, all with one desired effect, Erotica. Exquisite locations, superb wardrobe, gorgeous and exotic women, and real attention to photographic detail are all part and parcel of Soloerotica 9. Of course, it was directed by Michael Ninn whose middle name is "attention to detail."
